attachments.displayName:
725 Country Wood Lane, Arroyo Grande, Ca, 93420
4beds/3full,1 3/4,1 1/2 baths
Built in 2004
4369 Sq. Ft.
$1,399,000

Charming and Elegant best describes this one of a kind Estate. Serenely resting on 4.6 level acres located near 2 great Golf Courses. As you enter this enchanting Tutor Style Home you are greeted with comfort and sophistication with top quality materials used thru out. Bright and open the kitchen offers an eat in area, center island and outstanding appliances. The open & airy formal living room & dining room share an entertaining terrace that overlooks the acreage and gardens. All 4 bedrooms enjoy their own private baths and the master suite epitomizes the understated grace of the home. An opulent media room, family room w/wetbar, office and 4th bedroom occupy the downstairs area. Park like grounds boast a vast lawn, firepit, 40 fruit trees and professionally landscaped gardens with the entire 4.6 acres on irrigation. This property offers the best of two sought after worlds: A peaceful, seemingly secluded country estate but close to the beach, shopping recreation and entertainment.

Contact Diana Pellerin for a private showing (805) 878-9078

#arroyograndehomeforsale #realestate #homeforsale #centralcoasthomes #forsale #stunning #estate #estateforsale #centralcoastestate
